## ScrollbarPair.isVisible() method

If any of the scrollbars are visible. Non-paired scrollbars may disappear when they aren't needed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isVisible(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

True if visible.
